name: Inner Sphere
available_tech: Irian Weapons Works Super 6 Medium Laser

Anywhere.desc: A real nowhere unless you're a pirate

Ares.desc: Free port, also houses a Mech factory

Atreus.desc: The capital of the Free Worlds League

Baxley.desc: A real backwater world of absolutely no importance

Beecher.desc: Strong industry and agriculture, excellent wines

Benjamin.desc: Regional capital of the nexus of the Combine and decently important economically.

Betelgeuse.desc: Major industrial center including a Mech complex

Bountiful Harvest.desc: Largest agricultural planet in the Commonwealth

Capella.desc: The ex-capital of the Capellan Confederation

Carse.desc: Center for plastic and plastisteel manufacturing

Chalouba.desc: Pastoral but with growing electronics industry

Claybrooke.desc: Major exports are ranch and dairy products

Coventry.desc: Industrial World, Regional Capital, A battle on it helped spawn the Second Star League

Delacambre.desc: Agricultural world supporting several near planets

Dieron.desc: Regional capital and living testament to the Combine's ability to ultimately impose its will over those of Terran-based empires.

Dixie.desc: Known for good food and warm hospitality

Donegal.desc: Rich in diamonds, rare metals, and traders

Dustball.desc: Where the elite satisfy their most wicked desires

Exedor.desc: Liao personal treasures guarded by crack troops

Frazer.desc: Large producer of rice, some petroleum

Galedon V.desc: Known for its high grade industrial diamonds.

Gibson.desc: Amazing diversity of peoples and religions

Goodna.desc: A planet filled with rare edible delicacies

Grand Base.desc: Military staging, training and repair facility

Great Gorge.desc: Nice world rich in minerals on the edge of nowhere

Hesperus II.desc: Home of one of the largest mech manufacturing facilities in the Inner Sphere. Repelled many raids across the succession wars

Hobbs.desc: Giant cave systems here used as warehouses

Hoff.desc: Houses the Friden Aerospace research facility

Immenstadt.desc: Cold much of the year, strong hydroponic industry

Irian.desc: Irian is home of the eponymous mega corporation, which produces interstellar media, industrial and commercial products, battle armor, and BattleMechs.  The company runs the planet, giving it immense influence.

Irurzun.desc: A valuable world housing a sizable military force

Kathil.desc: Home to the Kathil Shipyards which produce Jumpships and Warships as well as a General Motors Factory and dozens of other smaller industrial concerns

Keid.desc: Many military, training and research facilities

Kessel.desc: Strong rebel forces - visits may be dangerous

Kirchbach.desc: Few resources but a temperate climate

Kittery.desc: Inhospitable jungle world, natives in rebellion

Kobe.desc: Major producer of electronics and chemical engines

Lesnovo.desc: Often raided by bandits of the Marian Hegemony

Luthien.desc: Aside from the importance imparted from being the imperial capital, the so-called "Black Pearl" is again doubly important to House Kurita as being one of the most industrialized worlds in the Inner Sphere.

Mallory's World.desc: Once plentiful agri-world now war torn

Marduk.desc: One of the best socio-industrial levels outside of Terra and home to some of the most prolific mech factories in the Inner Sphere

Matsuida.desc: Nicknamed 'Nausea' - planet is known for seafood

Milos.desc: Agricultural world of some strategic importance

Mosiro.desc: Mostly moslem, strong in astrophysics and the arts

Nestor.desc: Agricultural mostly rice and other cereals

New Aragon.desc: Captured in 2832, House Liao still claims it

New Avalon.desc: The capital of the Federated Suns

New Delos.desc: Beautiful world but a depressed economy

New Hessen.desc: Main recruiting and training center for House Liao

New Samarkand.desc: Home of the Internal Security Force

New Syrtis.desc: Military capital of the Capellan March

Noatak.desc: Known for its whales, seals and aquatic life

Oliver.desc: Much industry including a Mech plant

Oriente.desc: Lush, green world of rolling grassland and forests

Outreach.desc: Home of the Wolf's Dragoons -- currently testing Clan units

Port Moseby.desc: Major trading center - anything for a price

Poulsbo.desc: Jumping off point for regiments attacking Marik

Quentin.desc: Populous and fantastically wealthy in mineral riches and home to a prolific mech factory.

Radstadt.desc: One of the largest prisons of the Combine is here

Redfield.desc: Such a constant battlefield nothing else happens

Regulus.desc: An important trading hub. Regulans are known for their financial prowess. Regulus lacks any heavy industries, but Aiutaki Academy produces excellent MechWarriors.

Robinson.desc: Military capital of the Terran March

Rubigen.desc: An ice world known for its wolverine pelts

Sadurni.desc: A frozen, barren, lifeless rock - see you there

Shiloh.desc: Main exports include woodcarvings and silkscreens

Silver.desc: Named for its large deposits of that ore

Skye.desc: Major Dropship and vehicle production, A Regional Capital, as well as a Hotbed of Dissent against the Archon on many occasions

Sol.desc: The cradle of civilization. -- currently testing star league mechs

Solaris VII.desc: The Gladiator World, fantastic plots typically originate here and it makes the Commonwealth a lot of money

Sophie's World.desc: A center for the arts and learning

Suzano.desc: Famous for Ando Bass fished from its frozen seas

Tamarind.desc: The talent of the artists here is legendary

Tharkad.desc: The capital of the Lyran Commonwealth

Thestria.desc: Frozen ball known only for precious metal deposits

Tikonov.desc: Earthwerks Incorporated, Ceres, Grand Union Battleworks, Harcourt Products, Lebedev Nautical Enterprises

Turin.desc: Noted for its horses and special cattle

Valloire.desc: Producer of the best teas in the Commonwealth

Vega.desc: Home of Cosby Myomer Research Company

Winfield.desc: Agricultural world with long growing season

Xinyang.desc: Resort atmosphere catering to soldiers on leave

Zanzibar.desc: Famous black market - anything can be bought here
